text: Judy Llewellyn Bradley, née Bratt (born October 18, 1952 in Regina, Saskatchewan)Judy Bradley at the Encyclopedia of Saskatchewan. is a Canadian former provincial politician. She was the Saskatchewan New Democratic Party member of the Legislative Assembly of Saskatchewan for the constituencies of Bengough-Milestone from 1991 to 1995, and Weyburn-Big Muddy from 1995 to 1999. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Regina, Saskatchewan Category:Saskatchewan New Democratic Party MLAs Category:Women MLAs in Saskatchewan
title: Judy Bradley
